info.title: Elemental Cloud API Documentation
info.description: API documentation for Elemental Cloud application

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all affiliate relationships. Requires list-affiliates permission.

403.description: Forbidden - User doesn't have list-affiliates permission

post.description: Create a new affiliate relationship for the authenticated user. The system will automatically link the current user with their affiliate. Requires create-affiliates permission.

403.description: Forbidden - User doesn't have create-affiliates permission

delete.description: Soft delete an affiliate relationship by ID. Requires delete-affiliates permission.

403.description: Forbidden - User doesn't have delete-affiliates permission

items.example: The selected id is invalid.

get.summary: Get all conversations for an AI application
get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all conversations for a specific AI application. This endpoint is publicly accessible.

get.summary: Get all messages in a conversation
get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all messages within a specific conversation in an AI application. This endpoint is publicly accessible.

get.summary: Get token usage statistics for all AI applications
get.description: Retrieve global token usage statistics across all applications. Can be grouped by user or by application. Designed for dashboard reports and line charts.

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: Period type for grouping statistics (default: monthly)

parameters.name: group_by_app
parameters.description: Set to true to group statistics by application (shows usage per app)

post.summary: Send a message to AI application
post.description: Send a message to an AI application and receive a response. Can create a new conversation or continue an existing one. Supports file attachments (images, PDFs). This endpoint is publicly accessible.

message.description: Message content to send to AI

conversation_id.description: Existing conversation ID (optional - creates new conversation if not provided)

from_source.description: Source of the message (e.g., web, mobile, api)

files.description: Optional file attachments (max 5 files, 20MB each). Supported: jpg, jpeg, png, gif, webp, pdf

200.description: Message sent successfully and AI response received

content.example: Machine learning is a subset of artificial intelligence...

items.example: The message field is required.
The selected conversation id is invalid.
The file must be a file of type: jpg, jpeg, png, gif, webp, pdf.

get.summary: Get all AI applications with filters and pagination
get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of AI applications with search and sorting options.

post.description: Create a new AI application with provider, model, and configuration settings.

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific AI application by ID.

put.description: Update an existing AI application's configuration.

delete.description: Soft delete an AI application by ID.

post.summary: Generate new API key for AI application
post.description: Generate a new API key for the specified AI application. The old key will be invalidated.

patch.description: Enable or disable an AI application.

get.summary: Get all AI model prices with filters and pagination
get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of AI model pricing information with search, filtering by provider, and sorting options.

post.summary: Create a new AI model price
post.description: Create a new pricing record for an AI model. Prices are typically per tokens (e.g., per 1000 tokens).

tokens.description: Number of tokens this price applies to

get.description: Retrieve detailed pricing information for a specific AI model by ID.

put.description: Update an existing pricing record for an AI model.

delete.description: Soft delete an AI model pricing record by ID.

get.summary: Get all AI providers with filters and pagination
get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of AI providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, etc.) with search and sorting options.

post.description: Create a new AI provider configuration with API key and settings.

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific AI provider by ID.

put.description: Update an existing AI provider configuration.

delete.description: Soft delete an AI provider by ID.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all available AI provider types (e.g., openai, anthropic, google, etc.).

get.summary: Get available models for AI provider
get.description: Retrieve a list of available AI models for a specific provider (e.g., gpt-4, claude-3-opus, etc.).
Retrieve a paginated list of Aiship products.

post.description: Create a new Aiship product with full configuration including stock, pricing, options, and SEO settings.

file.description: Image file (jpg, jpeg, png, webp). Max size: 10MB

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of app pages with sorting and search functionality.

post.description: Upsert app release configuration with mode, store links, and app versions. Mode must be from AppReleaseMode enum.

get.description: Retrieve app release information for a specific version. This endpoint does not require authentication.

post.description: Reset app settings order to default for a specific user.
Reset all app settings to default order.

post.summary: Set default app setting by user
post.description: Set default app setting for a specific user.
Set an app setting as default.
Update order numbers for multiple app settings at once.
Authenticate user via Apple token from mobile app.

token.description: Apple identity token from mobile app

post.description: Handle Apple OAuth callback with authorization code. Authenticates user via Apple Sign In.

get.description: Receives Apple OAuth form_post response. This endpoint accepts both GET and POST methods to handle Apple's redirect flow.

post.description: Change the password for the currently authenticated user. Requires the old password for verification and a new password that must be confirmed. Both passwords must be 8-16 characters.

password.description: New password (8-16 characters, must be confirmed)

message.example: Your password has been changed successfully

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing token, or incorrect old password

items.example: The password old field is required.
The password must be at least 8 characters.
The password confirmation does not match.

get.description: Validates if a password reset token is still valid, has not expired, and can be used to reset a password. This endpoint does not require authentication.

items.example: The token field is required.

delete.description: Remove the authenticated user's avatar image. The avatar field will be set to null.

post.description: Send password reset link to user's email address. The email must exist in the system. A reset token will be sent to the email for use in the password reset process.

email.description: User email address (must exist in system)

message.example: Password reset link has been sent to your email

items.example: The email field is required.

message.example: We couldn't find a user with that email address.

post.description: Authenticate user with email or user_id and password. Returns JWT token for accessing protected endpoints. Optionally accepts verification code for two-factor authentication.

email.description: User email address (required if user_id not provided)

user_id.description: User ID (required if email not provided)

items.example: The email field is required when user_id is not present.
The password field is required.

get.description: Logout the currently authenticated user by invalidating their JWT token.

items.example: The fcm token must be a string.

post.description: Create a new user account with name, email, and password. Optionally accepts affiliate token and invite code for referral tracking.

password.description: User password (8-16 characters, must be confirmed)

invite_code.description: Referral invite code from existing user (optional)

items.example: The name field is required.
The email has already been taken.
The password must be at least 8 characters.
The password confirmation does not match.
The selected invite code is invalid.

post.description: Reset user password using the token received via email from forgot-password endpoint. The new password must be 8-16 characters and confirmed.

password.description: New password (8-16 characters, must be confirmed)

message.example: Your password has been reset successfully
This password reset token is invalid or has expired

items.example: The password must be at least 8 characters.
The password confirmation does not match.

post.description: Authenticate user using a session ID. This endpoint is designed for app integrations where session-based authentication is used. Returns a JWT token for API access.

items.example: The session_id field is required.

post.description: Upload and update the authenticated user's avatar image. Accepts jpeg, png, jpg, or gif files with maximum size of 100MB.

avatar.description: Avatar image file (jpeg, jpg, png, gif - max 100MB)

items.example: The avatar field is required.

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about the currently authenticated user. Requires a valid JWT bearer token in the Authorization header.

post.description: Verify user login with two-factor authentication code. After initial login attempt, a 6-digit verification code is sent to the user. This endpoint validates the code and returns JWT token upon success.

email.description: User email address (required if user_id not provided)

user_id.description: User ID (required if email not provided)

items.example: The email field is required when user_id is not present.
The verification code must be 6 characters.

get.description: Verify a user's email address after registration using either a verification token or a 6-digit verification code. This endpoint does not require authentication. May return an auto-login token upon successful verification.

items.example: The email field is required.
Either token or verification_code is required.

post.description: Convert a web session token into a JWT token for API access. This endpoint bridges web-based authentication with API token authentication.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or expired session token

items.example: The session_token field is required.

get.summary: List permissions assigned to a role
